c0ders
 

/**
* c0ders is the story of a group of programmers that work in a small decadent ISP where they try to demonstrate
* everyday how professional they are, but of course without any comprehension of their so called "superiors"
*/

CURRENT-STABLE-RELEASE

Characters

Meet the wild bunch

Peter Class

An OOP fanatic, he loves developing using languages like java, c++, and sometimes perl. He drinks a cup of steaming java for every class he defines, but It's difficult to say what his real drug is.

He has a final goal: the ultimate superabstract generic objetc and his hierarchy. His search is like the quest for the Holy Grial, a search to prove his faith in OOP.

John Lisp

An Artificial Inteligence fanatic, he loves developing from simple PROLOG programs to complex CLIPS based production systems or neural networks. He tries to implement such systems at work.

He has a brillant theory: an ISP could be managed by only one person (or none, but laws wouldn't allow that), using a perfect structure of on-line registrations, automated bill shipment, virtual asistants with A.I., etc... and grow to the max with only the need of human intervention for new machine instalation.

Float

A PERL, C and assembler fanatic, he loves definig 4th dimensional triple pointer matrix, powerful regular expressions and developing atari style stick games. They coworkers think that behind his freaky facade there is a very dangerous hax0r. He loves drugs too, any legal drug of course (any permitted by dutch laws).

His goal: no goal, no expectations at all. He lives day by day, only give him a green-text console, and ashtray and loud music!!
